stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Command and Control Domain and IP Addresses Observed
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
Between 17 and 25 March 2015, multiple U.S. Government sources observed malware on their systems communicating or attempting to communicate with the following command and control (C2) IP addresses:
94.242.219.43 (Luxembourg) 151.80.211.7 (France) 85.25.104.158 (Germany)

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: This IP address was observed communicating with multiple U.S. Government hosts. It is also associated with the following domains: www.vchkputlmaovfo78.com www.ennjfxizrhvw.com vchkputlmaovfo78.com ocfwbhwxektqj.com khntqxtdmgeqb.com ennjfxizrhvw.com

This IP address was observed communicating with multiple U.S. Government hosts.
Sample POST request:
POST / HTTP/1.1 Via: Proxy Host: afxirhdmighucfezs.com Pragma: no-cache Connection: Keep-Alive Cache-Control: no-cache Content-Length: 408 +hbSsWaEky0aNzFKzv6gHifuce6FYMkmL10w60l0db/XVN
Sample Response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: nginx Date: Thu, 19 Mar 2015 09:33:17 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 44 Connection: keep-alive rDnRkPxkyHxtkwGcvJ06RR3rjEdCiGi1XVmyD9VlMT4=
The IP 151.80.211.7 is also associated with the following domains:
utuplxyqjwewuogp.com afxirhdmighucfezs.com

This IP address was observed communicating with multiple U.S. Government hosts. It is also associated with the following domains:
dddamtylnvseqjpe.com eyceznoxapjx2j.com ikbmzgfivqrw01.com static-ip-85-25-104-158.inaddr.ip-pool.com nfilikehfukwctgoc9.com ocfwbhwxektqj.com zgdphnaxljlex.com ylaem.devlpleducary.net
This domain is associated with malicious activity across different U.S. Government departments and various malicious IP addresses.
